title: THE TALL MAN -- Garrett and the Kid ( 1960 pilot episode )
description:
This 2-season western "wonder" starred Barry Sullivan as Sheriff Pat Garrett and 
32 year-old Clu Gulager as teenage (!!) outlaw William Bonney a.k.a. "Billy the Kid".

If you can get around Gulager being too old for the historical role he is playing, the odd relationship between these two men is what makes the show so interesting.  It's one of the few series from that era ( the early 1960s ) to co-star a criminal whom Sheriff Garrett allows to get away with a lot of his bad behavior, while Billy manages to cover up his more serious crimes such as robbery and quite possibly even murder!

Add to that some cool music by Mexican composer Juan GarcÃƒÂ­a Esquivel ( credited only as "Esquivel" ), and you have yourself the making of a better than average half-hour black & white TV western!

In real life Garrett shot his notorious outlaw friend, but there was no series finale filmed.
